metadata.name: King Kunta
metadata.description:
This unique art piece is based on the genius rapper Kendrick Lamar, inspired by his passion for standing up for the rights of African Americans; using both his exceptional musical talent and platform to tell stories of the realities the black person, and also to preach justice and equality.

King Kunta was hand drawn with graphite and charcoal on Stathmore Bristol paper (2021).
